about_the_game:
Step into the eerie world of the night shift at an old warehouse, where each passing hour unveils new terrors. Tasked with completing random objectives under a time limit of your shift, you must navigate through the darkness while evading malevolent entities from an unknown realm. As the nights progress, so do the challenges, with shadowy figures and otherworldly beings lurking around every corner. The key to survival lies in following the rules provided with your job application. Simple yet easily forgotten, these rules serve as your most important asset, ensuring your safety during the seven terrifying days of labor.

Things you can expect:

  • Randomly generated tasks and objectives each playthrough
  • Subtle and unnoticed scares
  • 7 nights of varying difficulty
  • Uncoverable story and lore
  • Multiple endings
  • Safely watch cameras and pass time from your office
  • Rules you must definently follow

Step into the eerie atmosphere of the rundown warehouse, where darkness shrouds every corner and whispers echo in the air.


The setting is designed to send shivers down your spine, with flickering lights casting eerie shadows on old and forgotten crates. Each time you play, new tasks pop up unexpectedly, keeping you on your toes as you rush to complete them while dodging unearthly beings hot on your trail.


The rules, crucial for your survival, are prominently posted throughout, serving as constant reminders of the dangers lurking nearby.


As the nights pass, things only get tougher, pushing your skills and nerves to the limit.


Will you make it through or will you fall prey to the warehouse's sinister secrets?

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains violence, fear and psychological horror, dark themes and strong language

name: How to Survive the Night shift

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card

short_description: As you begin your night shift in the aged warehouse, an unsettling atmosphere descends. Shadows flit in your peripheral vision, strange whispers echo around you. Finding a mysterious list of rules, you wonder: prank or something serious? Nervously, you step into the dimly lit warehouse.
